game.name: Bakken - Ski Jumping: Next Season
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bakken - Ski Jumping: Next Season is a winter sports simulation game. Compete with more than 200 male and female ski jumpers on more than 10 hills and master the jumping, the flying and the landing! The next season starts here ...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bakken - Ski Jumping: Next Season is a winter sports simulation game. Compete with more than 200 male and female ski jumpers on more than 10 hills and master the jumping, the flying and the landing! The next season starts here ...
